snippet.title: The Quivering (1998) PC
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

The Quivering (1998) PC

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Info:◄
http://www.mobygames.com/game/quivering

https://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=16281

https://www.igdb.com/games/the-quivering

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►The Hall:◄ --- German/Deutsch
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

►The Hall:◄ --- English
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=2

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Gameplay:◄
1:37

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►You can get the game here:◄

Amazon Germany (Affiliate link):
https://amzn.to/3D7rHii

eBay Germany (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/cTDBo6

eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/6Llu5B

G2A (Affiliate link):
https://www.g2a.com/n/quiveringglobal
https://www.g2a.com/n/quiveringgift

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/345290/The_Quivering/

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Hall Support:◄

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

Abo / Sub:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

G2A (Affiliate link) :
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e

G2A Join my team to support me: 
Please ask for an Invite link 

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=19996679

TipeeeStream:
https://www.tipeeestream.com/hofpg/donation 

#gaming #adventure #youtubegaming #firstperson #1998
